version.text: Enhancing the layout for tablets to make better use of the available screen size

Android 11: Support for bubble notifications. You will have to enable them for Link, through your system settings.
In the notification section of settings, there is a new preference: hide message content
When enabled, the content of the new message will not be displayed within the notification - only the conversation title
This preference is for those people that want a bit more privacy out of their notifications
To hide the conversation title along with the message content, you can make the conversation private, as has always been available

Revamp attachments and drafts for media:
> Allow for viewing all of the images that are currently attached (instead of just providing a counter for the number attached)
> Allow for drafts of all the different media attached (instead of only creating a draft from the most recent image selected)
> Allow for different types of media being selected together (send a video along with an image, audio, whatever, during the same message)
> Allow editing/cropping any of the still images that are selected (instead of just the most recent)

If you have had issues, in the past, sending messages from your tablet, the web, or the chrome app/extension, please do the following:
1. On your phone, go to "My Account", then "Delete Account"
2. Clear the app data from your system's settings
3. Open up the phone and go through the setup process again (you can use the same email.)
You will have to log in again on all your devices if you do this.
